description: This module provides functions to handle JSON data related to bubbles, including creating folders, saving responses, and retrieving various bubble information.

functions.name: create_bubble_folders
functions.description: Creates folders for categorized, uncategorized, and DM bubbles based on the bubble overview JSON data.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbles_path
parameters.description: Base path where bubble folders will be created.

functions.name: save_response_to_file
functions.description: Saves the given response data to a specified file.

parameters.name: response_data
parameters.description: The response data to be saved.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the file where the response data will be saved.

functions.name: getvalueLogin
functions.description: Retrieves a specific value from the login JSON file.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the login JSON file.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The key whose value needs to be retrieved.

functions.name: getaccesstoken
functions.description: Retrieves the access token from the specified JSON file.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the JSON file containing the access token.

functions.name: getdetailedbubbleoverview
functions.description: Retrieves detailed bubble overview information from the specified JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: getbubbleoverview
functions.description: Retrieves bubble overview information from the specified JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_dms
functions.description: Retrieves direct messages (DMs) from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_categorized_bubbles
functions.description: Retrieves categorized bubbles from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_uncategorized_bubbles
functions.description: Retrieves uncategorized bubbles from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_unread_bubbles
functions.description: Retrieves unread bubbles from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_categories
functions.description: Retrieves categories from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

functions.name: get_clientUserInfo
functions.description: Retrieves client user information from the specified JSON file.

parameters.name: authTokenJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the JSON file containing the authentication token.

functions.name: get_org_id
functions.description: Retrieves the organization ID from the specified JSON file.

parameters.name: authTokenJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the JSON file containing the authentication token.

functions.name: get_channelcodes
functions.description: Retrieves channel codes from the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubbleOverviewJSONPath
parameters.description: Path to the bubble overview JSON file.

parameters.name: bubble_id
parameters.description: Optional bubble ID to retrieve a specific channel code.
